## RefInstance type

Extracts the underlying Ref instance type from a component's props. If the component does not have a ref, the type will be `never`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RefInstance<Props> = Props extends {
    ref?: Ref<infer I>;
} ? I : never;
```
